abstract: Former Florida Gov Jeb Bush resigns from each of his corporate and nonprofit board positions, latest sign that he is preparing for 2016 presidential campaign.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Bush gave up positions at an online education firm and his own education foundation this week, the latest nonpolitical commitments from which he has detached himself as he looks toward 2016.
snippet: Mr. Bush gave up positions at an online education firm and his own education foundation this week, the latest nonpolitical commitments from which he has detached himself as he looks toward 2016.

headline.main: Jeb Bush Resigns From Board Seats, Possibly Edging Closer to Presidential Run
headline.print_headline: Jeb Bush Leaves Boards, Edging Closer to a ’16 Run
